verbs.description: frenchify (third-person singular simple present frenchifies, present participle frenchifying, simple past and past participle frenchified)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To make French or more French-like in any way.
examples: This café likes to frenchify the names of its dishes to make them sound better than they actually are — they call their fish and chips "poisson-frites".

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To become French or more French-like.
(transitive, uncommon) Synonym of gallicize, to translate into the French language.
